items.title: EchoStar Sells AWS-3 Spectrum To SpaceX In $2.6 Billion Deal Amid FCC Pressure
items.description: The deal values the assets at a 73% discount to EchoStar’s reported $9.8 billion book value.

items.title: Why Is Applovin Stock Rising Today?
items.description: Goldman Sachs increased Applovin’s target price after its better-than-expected Q3 print.

items.title: DuPont Announces $2 Billion Share Buyback: Why Did The Stock Tumble 7% Today?
items.description: The company has revised its full-year 2025 net sales forecast to nearly $6.84 billion, down from its prior estimate of approximately $6.87 billion.
